original: 中山魏昌人，西晉官員，劉蕃之子、劉琨之兄。有才器，名顯一時。但因西晉末年八王之亂，宦海沉浮。約在五胡亂華，漢趙攻破洛陽前病逝。
text: Weichang, Zhongshan, official of the Western Jin Dynasty, son of Liu Fan, brother of Liu Kun. Talented, famous for a while. However, due to the rebellion of the Eight Kings in the last years of the Western Jin Dynasty, the eunuch sea was ups and downs. Around the fifth chaos, Han and Zhao died of illness before breaking through Luoyang.
